name: Demeaning of Life
description:
Demeaning of life is a game where you traverse a world, uncovering mysteries by… dying! Use your own corpse, uh… head, to build a temporary platform and jump on it to reach places that were otherwise out of your grasp. Solve puzzles, move to the sound of Drum’n’Bass, die (a lot). Take a lift, and peek at the deepest of the deep in the search for answers.

Lore: "After his death, Ridley finds himself alive in the same place where he died: Mould Dungeon. The walls that once saw him getting relentlessly torn, battered, destroyed, and pretty much dead, realize that he's now alive. But these same walls will see everything happening again and again and again as Ridley dies and lives and dies.... Forever."
